titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that money from the drug trade helps finance terror and terrorism and that the link between drugs and terror is one more reason for children not to use drugs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 2/8/2002--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that educating children about how the drug trade helps finance terror gives them another reason not to use drugs and makes them less likely to do so.
